title: Yet Another RPG Music Pack
longDescription:
⚔️ A whole soundtrack ready for your game! 34 tracks 🎵


Nearly 35 minutes of music. All tracks loop seamlessly.


This music pack is a tribute to the music I was listening to while playing in the 90s on my Super Nes with my brother and my friends.


I had a lot of fun making it and I hope you will find it useful for your game projects.


AUDIO DEMO


Still not convinced? Ha! Here's a super secret link for you then. 🤫


📃 TRACKLIST


(Title Screen) A Dark Fate Awaits


(Town Theme #1) The Ice Village

(Town Theme #2) People of the Desert

(Town Theme #3) Voices of the Trees


(Battle Theme #1) Let's Fight!

(Battle Theme #2) You Will Not Escape!

(Battle Theme #3) The Disgusting Captain Mucus

(Battle Theme #4) Guns and Powder

(Battle Theme #5) The Goofy Boss

(Battle Theme #6) Decisive Battle


(Dungeon Theme #1) The Ancient Cave

(Dungeon Theme #2) Imprisoned in the Dungeon of the Forgotten

(Dungeon Theme #3) The Manor of Don Cornio

(Dungeon Theme #4) The Volcano


(Field Theme #1) The Forest of a Thousand Spirits

(Field Theme #2) The Lost Continent

(Field Theme #3) Burning Sand

(Field Theme #4) Footsteps in the Snow


(Map Theme) Airship Travel


(Character Theme #1) Cards, Alcohol & Cigarettes

(Character Theme #2) The Haunted Fun Fair

(Character Theme #3) The Lonesome Cowboy

(Character Theme #4) The Crazy Show -12 loops


(Castle Theme #1) The King Asks To See You

(Castle Theme #2) The Castle is Saved


(Emotional Event #1) Desolate Fields

(Emotional Event #2) Sleeping Under The Stars


(Ending Theme) The End


(Game Over #1 Jingle) You Lost

(Game Over #2) Retry Screen

(Victory #1 Jingle) You Found the Sacred Sword

(Victory #2 Jingle) Level Complete!

(Victory #3 Jingle) Item won!

(Victory #4) Nice score!


🦉 twitter.com/clementpanchout 🕸️ clementpanchout.com
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Wavs: 34

Number of Audio Cues: 34

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz/16 bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 35 minutes

Size: 353 MB

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
